wikipedia_page.main:
David Robert Bowe (born 19 July 1955) was a Member of the European Parliament for Labour from 1989 to 2004.Bowe was educated at Sunderland Polytechnic, Teesside Polytechnic, and the University of Bath.  He worked as a science teacher, and became active in the Labour Party, serving on Middlesbrough District Council, and on the executive of the party's northern region.Bowe was elected to the European Parliament at the 1989 European Parliament election, representing Cleveland & Yorkshire North (1989–1994), then Cleveland & Richmond (1994–1999) and Yorkshire and the Humber (1999–2004).
He stood for re-election in 2004, but was defeated.

response: David Bowe (born January 4, 1964) is a character actor in American movies and television.  His best-known role is that of George Newman's sidekick, Bob, in 1989's UHF.TV.com biography His other film credits include A Few Good Men (1992), Made in America (1993, starring Whoopi Goldberg), Heavyweights (1995), The Rock (1996), Kicking & Screaming (2005), and Rubber (2010).
